main_definition: To contain or be part of a larger group, set, collection, or entity; to encompass as an element within something else.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Particularly taken into consideration or accounted for
meanings_and_examples.example: When planning the event budget, we made sure all expenses were included.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To make someone a part of a list, group, or set; to add as an element within it
meanings_and_examples.example: She was not initially invited but later asked if she could join the party and was kindly included.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Included in a price or deal
meanings_and_examples.example: The flight is $100, which includes meals and taxes.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To incorporate as part of something larger; to be encompassed within it
meanings_and_examples.example: His ideas were included in the final project proposal by the team.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To have (something) as a feature or characteristic
meanings_and_examples.example: The car has many features, including advanced safety systems and entertainment options.
